reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's soft ribbed texture, high-end feel, and perfect fit, with one noting it looks more expensive than its price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Soft, feels expensive and fits great!
items.body: Don’t hesitate on buy in this! It’s so soft, feels expensive and fits perfectly. I wanted a nicer sweater to wear to a Christmas party with some wide leg jeans and this was so cute. The baggy sleeves add a little flair but aren’t over the top. I went with black but I’m going to look for another color because I think the black hides some of the style….but black is a staple color for me so I’ll keep this one too. I went with a medium when normally I would go with a large but the medium is perfect. It’s supposed to be a loose so I’m glad I went with the medium, the large would have been too big. I’m 5’2” and around 140lbs with a 36D bra size. Overall, this was a great find and I would definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend!
items.body: True to size, soft, warm and good quality Read more
items.author: Girl mama

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed! I bought it in 7 colors!
items.body: I bought this sweater in seven colors and I'm not disappointed. BUT... there are some drawbacks. #1) It ships tightly folded in a vacuum-sealed bag and has DEEP crease marks at first. I had to remove all the tags and place the sweaters, two at a time, in the dryer on a steam cycle to see if the creases would even come out, or else I'd be returning them all. Luckily the creases did come out. #2) The care instructions are ridiculous. This is a high-maintenance sweater, no doubt. Machine wash in a garment bag, no dryer - can only be flat-dried or hung. Doesn't exactly fit my lifestyle, but the sweater is cozy and such a pleasure to wear. The lantern sleeves are a little impractical but look cute. They get in the way if you're trying to actually do anything like cook, or even when you wash your hands. But they're cute. (Did I mention they're cute?) I'm going to try to preserve the life of these sweaters by using my dryer's steam refresh cycle as much as possible instead of actually washing it between each wear. I'll report back on how that goes. Read more
items.author: Sabrina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and comfort is 10/10
items.body: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this sweater. It did get snagged on something but I was able to pull the snag throughto the inside and it looks brand new. I'm ordering in ALL colors. Fits just like the picture, and is extremely comfortable. Can dress it up or down. Read more
items.author: Ashley Cyrus

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too long and bulky. Not true to size
items.body: I did follow the size chart that recommended a Medium. I should have sized down to a small. I loved the color and texture, material is heavy and falls well, but it does have a lot of extra material around the sleeves especially at the wrist. This makes it look bulky on a slim frame. I am 5’2” and 129 lbs and this sweater is way too long in the medium, even to wear it with leggings. Lately the size charts have not been accurate on a lot of items I have bought. Disappointed to say the least! Read more
items.author: Indi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: I love the simple style of this sweater, and the thick, cozy material. It fits true to size, and the two that I have are color accurate to the pictures. The quality is good and holds up to washing really well without shrinking or stretching! Read more
items.author: Jennie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite sweater- Warm and Comfortable.
items.body: This is the second time I have bought the sweater and I still love it. Great staple to have and comfy to wear. Read more
items.author: DBangs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color shown online matches the actual sweater
items.body: Color is exactly as pictured. Nice weight to the material. Very soft. Washes well. Size fits a little loose on this one. The next one I ordered was very large. Read more
items.author: Lesa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Watermelon, Lightblue, Peach, Apricot, Black, Camel, Ginger, Lake, Dustyblue, Oatmeal, Orange, Armygreen, Dustypink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
